headline: JPMorgan Lifts AEP Price Target Following Utility Sector Model Update
summary: American Electric Power Company, Inc. (NASDAQ:AEP) is included among the 15 Best Blue-Chip Stocks with Growing Dividends. On December 12, JPMorgan analyst Jeremy Tonet raised his price target on American Electric Power Company, Inc. (NASDAQ:AEP) to $125 from $121, while maintaining a Neutral rating on the stock. The adjustment followed updates to the firm’s models […]

headline: IDU: Utilities Dashboard For December
summary: Water utilities are undervalued by 18% vs. 11-year averages, while electricity/multi-utilities and gas utilities are slightly overvalued. Learn more about IDU here.
